title: AttributeError: module 'tables' has no attribute 'exceptions'
body:
I am on a Windows 10 PC, DLC 2.2rc3 in an anaconda env. I am trying to use the refine tracklets tab in the GUI. Originally, I was getting the error that "tables" didn't exist, and to pip install it. However, when I tried that it simply said it was already there. Someone on another thread mentioned that they had to uninstall pytables then pip install tables, so I tried this. Now I am getting a new error that I'm not sure how to resolve.
Code output

NoSuchNodeError Traceback (most recent call last) ~\Anaconda3\envs\DEEPLABCUT\lib\site-packages\pandas\io\pytables.py in get_node(self, key) 1502 try: -> 1503 node = self._handle.get_node(self.root, key) 1504 except _table_mod.exceptions.NoSuchNodeError: ~\Anaconda3\envs\DEEPLABCUT\lib\site-packages\tables\file.py in get_node(self, where, name, classname) 1634 nodepath = join_path(basepath, name or '') or '/' -> 1635 node = where._v_file._get_node(nodepath) 1636 elif isinstance(where, (str, numpy.str_)): ~\Anaconda3\envs\DEEPLABCUT\lib\site-packages\tables\file.py in _get_node(self, nodepath) 1589 -> 1590 node = self._node_manager.get_node(nodepath) 1591 assert node is not None, "unable to instantiate node ``%s``" % nodepath ~\Anaconda3\envs\DEEPLABCUT\lib\site-packages\tables\file.py in get_node(self, key) 431 if self.node_factory: --> 432 node = self.node_factory(key) 433 self.cache_node(node, key) ~\Anaconda3\envs\DEEPLABCUT\lib\site-packages\tables\group.py in _g_load_child(self, childname) 1177 # Is the node a group or a leaf? -> 1178 node_type = self._g_check_has_child(childname) 1179 ~\Anaconda3\envs\DEEPLABCUT\lib\site-packages\tables\group.py in _g_check_has_child(self, name) 392 if node_type == "NoSuchNode": --> 393 raise NoSuchNodeError( 394 "group ``%s`` does not have a child named ``%s``" NoSuchNodeError: group ``/`` does not have a child named ``/tracks`` During handling of the above exception, another exception occurred: AttributeError Traceback (most recent call last) ~\Anaconda3\envs\DEEPLABCUT\lib\site-packages\deeplabcut\gui\refine_tracklets.py in create_tracks(self, event) 313 314 def create_tracks(self, event): --> 315 deeplabcut.stitch_tracklets( 316 self.config, 317 self.datafile, ~\Anaconda3\envs\DEEPLABCUT\lib\site-packages\deeplabcut\refine_training_dataset\stitch.py in stitch_tracklets(config_path, pickle_file, n_tracks, min_length, split_tracklets, prestitch_residuals, max_gap, weight_func, output_name) 1048 stitcher.build_graph(max_gap=max_gap, weight_func=weight_func) 1049 stitcher.stitch() -> 1050 stitcher.write_tracks(output_name, animal_names) 1051 return stitcher ~\Anaconda3\envs\DEEPLABCUT\lib\site-packages\deeplabcut\refine_training_dataset\stitch.py in write_tracks(self, output_name, animal_names) 867 if not output_name: 868 output_name = self.filename.replace("pickle", "h5") --> 869 df.to_hdf(output_name, "tracks", format="table", mode="w") 870 871 @staticmethod ~\Anaconda3\envs\DEEPLABCUT\lib\site-packages\pandas\core\generic.py in to_hdf(self, path_or_buf, key, mode, complevel, complib, append, format, index, min_itemsize, nan_rep, dropna, data_columns, errors, encoding) 2698 from pandas.io import pytables 2699 -> 2700 pytables.to_hdf( 2701 path_or_buf, 2702 key, ~\Anaconda3\envs\DEEPLABCUT\lib\site-packages\pandas\io\pytables.py in to_hdf(path_or_buf, key, value, mode, complevel, complib, append, format, index, min_itemsize, nan_rep, dropna, data_columns, errors, encoding) 312 path_or_buf, mode=mode, complevel=complevel, complib=complib 313 ) as store: --> 314 f(store) 315 else: 316 f(path_or_buf) ~\Anaconda3\envs\DEEPLABCUT\lib\site-packages\pandas\io\pytables.py in (store) 294 else: 295 # NB: dropna is not passed to `put` --> 296 f = lambda store: store.put( 297 key, 298 value, ~\Anaconda3\envs\DEEPLABCUT\lib\site-packages\pandas\io\pytables.py in put(self, key, value, format, index, append, complib, complevel, min_itemsize, nan_rep, data_columns, encoding, errors, track_times, dropna) 1120 format = get_option("io.hdf.default_format") or "fixed" 1121 format = self._validate_format(format) -> 1122 self._write_to_group( 1123 key, 1124 value, ~\Anaconda3\envs\DEEPLABCUT\lib\site-packages\pandas\io\pytables.py in _write_to_group(self, key, value, format, axes, index, append, complib, complevel, fletcher32, min_itemsize, chunksize, expectedrows, dropna, nan_rep, data_columns, encoding, errors, track_times) 1753 return 1754 -> 1755 group = self._identify_group(key, append) 1756 1757 s = self._create_storer(group, format, value, encoding=encoding, errors=errors) ~\Anaconda3\envs\DEEPLABCUT\lib\site-packages\pandas\io\pytables.py in _identify_group(self, key, append) 1796 def _identify_group(self, key: str, append: bool) -> Node: 1797 """Identify HDF5 group based on key, delete/create group if needed.""" -> 1798 group = self.get_node(key) 1799 1800 # we make this assertion for mypy; the get_node call will already ~\Anaconda3\envs\DEEPLABCUT\lib\site-packages\pandas\io\pytables.py in get_node(self, key) 1502 try: 1503 node = self._handle.get_node(self.root, key) -> 1504 except _table_mod.exceptions.NoSuchNodeError: 1505 return None 1506 AttributeError: module 'tables' has no attribute 'exceptions'

**How to Reproduce the problem** Steps to reproduce the behavior: 1. Go to refine tracklets tab 2. Click on step 1: create tracks 4. See error
